page.title: 10CLUBS & ORGANISATIONS-CONT
page.content: sixes.We have Imps,Kelpies,Pixes and Elves each six has a Sixer and a Seconder.We begin our meetings by telling the good deeds we have done that week then we are inspected and work for badges at the end of the meet ing we sing Brownie Bells. {GUIDES Guides meet every Monday night.There are 35 guides in the company.We usually start working in our patrols at about 7.15pm.Each patrol can choose what they want to do for the first hour.We learn different kinds of knots and how to pitch tents.The average number of people in one patrol is seven .At the end of our meeting somebody reads a prayer,then we all join in the singing of "Taps".When we have cleaned up all our mess,it is about 9.00pm this is when our meeting ends.
